results.content: Thank you for both showing how to make bots with and without code. Of course I'd like to follow the code line by line, not to see it copypasted somewhere from the source, but that are my personal preferences. Also now facebook interface looks differently and something needs to be updated (see my answer in Q&A to the question about CURL), but anyway I've got very useful knowledge and made my first facebook bot. Thank you!
results.content_html: Thank you for both showing how to make bots with and without code. Of course I'd like to follow the code line by line, not to see it copypasted somewhere from the source, but that are my personal preferences. Also now facebook interface looks differently and something needs to be updated (see my answer in Q&A to the question about CURL), but anyway I've got very useful knowledge and made my first facebook bot. Thank you!

results.content: I enjoyed this course. Largely because I was getting in to building a chat bot. Had I had not seen the tutorial on chat fuel then went into this the level of detail. But you should be clear that half of this course is in fact the video tutorial on that fuel the Chatfield really should have created and put on youtube. He discourages me that I would pay for what was essentially a tutorial that the company should offer for free. I got this course for 10 dollars and I feel its probably worth that investment, but I would not pay the list price. In any circumstances.
results.content_html: I enjoyed this course. Largely because I was getting in to building a chat bot. Had I had not seen the tutorial on chat fuel then went into this the level of detail. But you should be clear that half of this course is in fact the video tutorial on that fuel the Chatfield really should have created and put on youtube. He discourages me that I would pay for what was essentially a tutorial that the company should offer for free. I got this course for 10 dollars and I feel its probably worth that investment, but I would not pay the list price. In any circumstances.

response.content:
Hi Tomar,
I have had over a thousand students make some very interesting Bots. Programing can be hard and a single typo can make your bot crash. Please double check your code and use the Tutorial as a guide :) 

I want you to be happy which is why I gave you the course for Free. Course has Over 8000+ happy students.
response.content_html:
Hi Tomar,
I have had over a thousand students make some very interesting Bots. Programing can be hard and a single typo can make your bot crash. Please double check your code and use the Tutorial as a guide :)

I want you to be happy which is why I gave you the course for Free. Course has Over 8000+ happy students.

results.content:
程式新手不推

results.content_html:
程式新手不推

results.content:
In lecture 34 we finished with deploying to Heroku and next lecture begins on Facebook for developers screen where my app should be but there is nothing. Also in lecture 34 heroku git:remote command is not used which creates a problem. I am not saying that the course is bad but it is like they didn't know whether to make it for beginners or not.
What i think is the stupidest thing is that he thinks i dont know how to open a terminal but after few lectures he thinks I allredy done this.

results.content: This is a good course for people with ZERO or LESS programming experience. But being a avid JS developer and Node.js user this course wasn't that much beneficial for me. But for newbies it's a good starter.
results.content_html: This is a good course for people with ZERO or LESS programming experience. But being a avid JS developer and Node.js user this course wasn't that much beneficial for me. But for newbies it's a good starter.

results.content: The title is misleading. This course is not about how to make a facebook messenger chatbot, rather how to setup a chatbot on Facebook messenger is not a complicated process.

response.content:
HI Siavash, 
In the Course Intro (which has a Free Preview) I mention, in detail, what is covered and focused on in the course and what is not covered. This is also mentioned in the course description. I did not want there to be any confusion, as this is not a class on node.js or machine learning or AIML and I was very explicit about this. The focus here is 100% on Facebook Messenger Bots. 

If you want to learn how to program, let me know, there are a couple of course that I can recommend.
response.content_html:
HI Siavash,
In the Course Intro (which has a Free Preview) I mention, in detail, what is covered and focused on in the course and what is not covered. This is also mentioned in the course description. I did not want there to be any confusion, as this is not a class on node.js or machine learning or AIML and I was very explicit about this. The focus here is 100% on Facebook Messenger Bots.

If you want to learn how to program, let me know, there are a couple of course that I can recommend.

results.content: Wow! Chatbots remind me of the early internet and unlike building a site back in those days, building a bot is very simple. I am new to programing and so far I have been able to build a couple of bots using this course. It is simply Great!

response.content:
John, 
I agree with you analysis. Chatbots really represent a very big opportunity. The next big one, like this, will be Virtual & Augmented Reality. Entering VR & AR will be very challenging unless you have a lot of resources or an amazing programmer. Chatbots really are a unique opportunity in that way.
response.content_html:
John,
